actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the addition of certain eastern national forest lands to the National Wilderness Preservation System, to amend section 3(b) of the Wilderness Act, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Eastern Wilderness Amendments - Provides for the addition of eastern national forest lands to the National Wilderness Preservation System. Provides for the study of other specified eastern national forest lands for addition to the National Wilderness Preservation System.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the addition of certain eastern national forest lands to the National Wilderness Preservation System, to amend section 3(b) of the Wilderness Act, and for other purposes.
